items.sentence: Tom's ex-wife wants to ruin his new relationship.
Does anybody have a logical explanation for this?
The church is midway between your house and mine.
Tom suggested I stay in Boston for another month.
I didn't pay any attention to what Tom was doing.
Tom told his son getting a tattoo was a bad idea.
It's a good thing that Tom was there to help you.
I'm glad that you were able to do that yesterday.
I don't want to do anything that would upset Tom.
Mary is cute, but I don't think she's very smart.
